articles.title: 'I never thought I'd be able to win 14 races in a year' says record-breaker Verstappen in Mexico - Formula 1
articles.description: Max Verstappen won his 14th Grand Prix of the season, setting a new record as he dominated in Mexico City. The Red Bull driver said he was “incredibly proud” to achieve the feat.
